post.text: "The thought of Donald Trump with nuclear weapons scares me to death. It should scare everyone." —Bruce Blair, former nuclear weapons launch officer

comment.author: Kayla
comment.text: If anyone is dangerous it is Hillary.If a country doesn't pay her enough she will go after them.She will be the mobster of the world.She lies and is a greedy crook

replies.author: Alyssa
replies.text: I think Putin is beginning to regret he didn't contribute to the Clinton Foundation...

replies.author: Katherine
replies.text: Trump represents the danger for USA and the whole world . Trump is unfit to have the control of the nuclear arsenal. When Trump said that "He knows more about Isis than the Generals Do " I can't imagine having Donald Trump in the White House he is like a nightmare for USA and the entirely world.😵😵😵😵😵 Hillary for President 2016!!!👍👍👍
